name: The Secret Shyft
description:
This is 'The Secret Shyft', the Desert Bus 2018 Game Jam submission from Brian 'magicpokey' Shoop with some art assets provided by Indiana Smith

This game only runs in windows.

!!VERY IMPORTANT!!  You MUST install the included Font (a .ttf file) BEFORE installing the game itself or severe problems will arise.

Thank You for your consideration! 

Be sure to check out www.desertbus.org!
